text: Automatically setting scale on a graph based on max value (Python)
I want to automatically set the vertical scale on a line graph, based on the maximum value in a dataset.
So far I came up with this method:

code:
if 0 < max and max <= 250:
    ymax = 250
elif 250 < max and max <= 500:
    ymax = 500
elif 500 < max and max <= 750:
    ymax = 750
elif 750 < max and max <= 1000:
    ymax = 1000

text: Could anyone recommend a more concise approach?
